nodes.text: Baous Gapuois was a Sith male doctor in the Hyland Organization for Rakghoul Neutralization during the era of the Galactic War. He was present during the Rakghoul pandemic on Alderaan, stationed in the operations command center within the rakghoul tunnels and was specializing as a supply officer for THORN volunteers affiliated with the reconstituted Sith Empire. He would later be stationed in the rakghoul tunnels on Tatooine and Corellia.
